channel.title: Zemfira on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in Zemfira on Rusland 1

item.title: Little Russia (Zemfira Amsterdam)
item.description: When I dare to speak some words in Russian, it is immediately noticed. Hear that, over there, a Dutchman! Once inside, it becomes even clearer. Perhaps because the coats are now stored, in a safe that causes four times heavy traffic in the corridors.

item.title: The 25-Year Career of Zemfira
item.description: We start with music, for a change from old to (very) new. 25 Years Zemfira Talgatovna Ramazanova (1976, in Tatar: Земфира Тәлгать кызы Рамазанова) made her debut in the last century (1999), under not overly creative but perhaps strategic title Zemfira.
